metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7946 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Information Exposure vulnerability in Unity8 as used on the Ubuntu phone and possibly also in Unity8 shipped elsewhere. This allows an attacker to enable the MTP service by opening the emergency dialer. Fixed in 8.11+16.04.20160111.1-0ubuntu1 and 8.11+15.04.20160122-0ubuntu1.

notes.Note: jdstrand> this is scheduled to be fixed in OTA9

criterions.comment: unity8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
